E-Mail Messages
Date: Tuesday, 4/1/1985
Subject: Retirement
Dear Sir,
It's been a hard decision, but I think I will retire
after this season. It's time to let the youngsters
take my job.

Regards,
Augustine Lucero



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1985
Subject: Progress of Shawn Deckert
Dear Sir,
Shawn Deckert is doing pretty good at A Shalomar Scythes!
He has an ERA of 3.93, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1985
Subject: Progress of Johnny Touchette
Dear Sir,
Johnny Touchette has nothing more to prove at AA Cordan Crows!
He has an ERA of 2.61 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director

Subject: Progress of Danial Sullivan

I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Date: Friday, 5/23/1985
Subject: Contract extension
Hello,
I just wanted to let you know that I'm
in my last year of the contract.
Are you interested in giving me an extension?
I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
Ramon Silvas



Date: Saturday, 5/24/1985
Subject: Contract extension question
Dear Sir,
My contract expires after this season.
I would like to resign, so please let's talk!

Regards,
Roger Dorn



Date: Wednesday, 5/28/1985
Subject: Well...
I am rather upset that I do not play regularly.
I wish to be traded if that doesn't change!

Regards,
Todd Tabb



Date: Sunday, 6/1/1985
Subject: Starting pitcher
Manager,
Believe it or not, but I am a starting pitcher!
Would you please treat me as one and put
me in the rotation?

Regards,
Pedro Manzano

Thomas Gordy
